title: Do stud finder apps for cell phones actually work? - Quora

response.answer_text: a stud finder is a magnet looking for magnetic material like nails that’s it in a nutshell. there isn’t anything to go through any material and just look for wood, unless you spend lots and lots of money for an x ray machine or mri, which probably costs more than the house. Use a hammer and your judgement the more experience you have the better you will be. or you can use a ruler find one stud and go for the 16″ or 24″ centers . If it is balloon framed , around 80 years or older could be another story. A lot of these questions are from people that have no experience and have no idea. a lot of these are impossible to answer without writing a book.
Yes! My cell phone found ME!
